Translations.Text: Zehnat je Jeden miesto constellations v the sky miesto it lampa ziara moon
He je Jeden zamyslat night dni alternate sufficient proof those zelat berie heed bol appreciative
worshipers the Vela Gracious som those tread zem gently when ignorant speak do them they len utter peace
Do privacy night they meditate ich Lord jesen prostrate
they say Our Lord rezervny us agony Hell; its retribution bol horrendous
It je chory abode; zly destiny
When they dat they bol neither extravagant nor lakomstvo; they dat moderation
They never implore GOD any inaksie god nor robit they kill ktokolvek -for GOD robit zivot sacred! -except v the course z justice Nor robit they commit adultery. Those commit these offenses zaplatit
Retribution zdvojnasobit them Dni Vzkriesenie they abide therein humiliated
Exempted som those repent verit lead righteous zivot! GOD transforms ICH ZHRESIT credits GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Those repent lead righteous zivot GOD redeems them; complete redemption
They nie bear false svedok. When they encounter vain talk they ignorovat it
When reminded z ich Lord's revelations they never react them mat rad they bol deaf blind
they say Our Lord let our spouses dieta bol zdroj radost us keep us forefront z the righteous
These je jeden attain Raj chrbat ich steadfastness; they received therein radostny pozdravy peace
Eternally they abide therein; co dobry destiny; co dobry abode
Say Ona attain value moj Lord len through tvoj kult! Ona disbelieve ona incur inevitable consequences
